question: Vatavaran-2019 Short Film Competition and Festival on Environment has recently started in which Indian city?
explanation: In a first, the four-day long Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change, MoEFCC & Centre for Media Studies (CMS) VATAVARAN-2019 Short Film Competition and Festival on Environment, begun on November 27,2019 was inaugurated at New Delhi. Range of discussions, seminars, workshops, interactions are also being organized to churn innovative ideas, paving a path for new talents and creative minds in the stream of film making with a sense of responsibility towards the Environment.
